mapper.sql: tid, id, siteid, nid, lid, user, user_type, user1, user2, user3, user4, pan, qishu, pid, oid, project, itmes, content, odds, jiner, jiner1, jiner2, jiner3, jiner4, jiner5, jinerb, share1, share2, share3, share4, share5, win_dream, win, win1, win2, win3, win4, win5, bonus, bonus1, bonus2, bonus3, bonus4, bonus5, tuishui, tuishui1, tuishui2, tuishui3, tuishui4, tuishui5, ip, hash, stataus, time_draw, time_in, time_add, time_jiesuan, time_pay, is_cancel, cancel_content, bet_time, win_lose_type
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from ds_jingdian_lottery
order by ${orderByClause}
select count(*) as bet_count,sum(jiner) as betamount,sum(jinerb) as validamount,sum(win) as winlose from ds_jingdian_lottery

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(d.bet_time,'%Y-%m-%d') bet_time, count(1) bet_count, SUM(d.jiner) betamount,SUM(d.win) winlose, SUM(d.jinerb) validamount FROM ds_jingdian_lottery d
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(d.bet_time,'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT IFNULL(t.id,51000) as game_type, IFNULL(t.game_name,'kg经典彩') game_name, COUNT(1) bet_count, SUM(d.jiner) betamount, SUM(d.win) winlose, SUM(d.jinerb) validamount FROM ds_jingdian_lottery d LEFT JOIN ds_game_type t ON d.lid = t.out_game_code and t.parent_id = 51
GROUP BY d.lid
